sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
migrate
, se selijo iz kraja v kraj, zlasti zato, da bi našli delo.

seg.quote: Millions have migrated to the cities.
Migration for work is accelerating in the Third World.
...the vast Greek migrations into Asia and Egypt.

sense.def:
Kadar ptice ali druge živali
migrate
, se za del leta preselijo in živijo nekje drugje, ter imajo tam mladiče in najdejo hrano.

seg.quote: Every spring they migrate towards the coast.
Swallows begin their migration south in early autumn.
